title: Lord of Fire
description: Gaians have stayed hidden from the eyes of humankind for centuries, but there is change in the air...An unexpected inheritance of title is thrust upon the young Gaian lord, Luminor, by the appearance of a deadly threat, spoken of in an ancient prophecy.This prophecy must be fulfilled. And Luminor is the one named for the task.A raving lunatic turns up in the main square of Splendo, dying of burns in front of a large crowd.Most say he is mad...but is he? Victims continue to arrive from the north with similar injuries.The desperate human council call for volunteers to deal with the problem and Luminor's secretive clan of Gaians risk everything by coming out of hiding to take up the quest in return for an alliance.Not only is it the fulfillment of Gaian prophecy it is also their only chance of survival.Luminor alone possesses the Supreme Power that can assure victory, embarking on an adventure that takes many turns as he grapples with his destiny as Lord of Fire, falls in love and overcomes betrayal, all testing his mystical talents to the limit.Only then, can he claim his soulmate and truly establish the Alliance.
author: Susi Wright
